Uses of Class
com.jgcomptech.tools.databasetools.jbdc.Database

  • Packages that use Database 
    Package Description
    com.jgcomptech.tools.authenication
    Contains classes to manage the login session to allow a user to login to your application
    com.jgcomptech.tools.databasetools.jbdc
    Contains tools to communicate with a database using JDBC

    • Uses of Database in com.jgcomptech.tools.authenication

      Methods in com.jgcomptech.tools.authenication with parameters of type Database 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SessionManager SessionManager.getInstance(Database usersDatabase, String appIconPath)
      Returns the instance of the SessionManager, if one doesn’t exist it is created

    • Uses of Database in com.jgcomptech.tools.databasetools.jbdc

      Methods in com.jgcomptech.tools.databasetools.jbdc with parameters of type Database 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean Database.Users.checkPasswordMatches(Database db, String username, String password)
      Checks to see if the specified password matches the stored password in the database
      static boolean Database.Users.create(Database db, String username, String password, String type)
      Creates a new user in the database using SHA-512 password hashing
      static void Database.Users.createTable(Database db, boolean suppressExistsError)
      Creates a Users table in the specified database
      static void Database.Settings.createTable(Database db, boolean suppressExistsError)
      Creates a Settings table in the specified database
      static boolean Database.Users.exists(Database db, String username)
      Checks if the specified username exists in the database
      static boolean Database.Settings.exists(Database db, String settingName)
      Checks if a setting exists in the settings table
      static String Database.Users.getUserType(Database db, String username)
      Returns userType for the specified username
      static String Database.Settings.getValue(Database db, String settingName)
      Returns a setting from the settings table, if setting doesn’t exist, returns an empty string
      static boolean Database.Users.setPassword(Database db, String username, String password)
      Sets a new password for an existing user using SHA-512 password hashing
      static boolean Database.Settings.setValue(Database db, String settingName, String settingValue)
      Sets a setting in the settings table, if setting doesn’t exist, it is created
